mapper.select: SELECT DELIVERY_NUM, DELIVERY_DATE, DELIVERY_CHECK, d.PRODUCT_ID, MEMBER_ID, p.PRODUCT_NAME, p.PRODUCT_PRICE FROM delivery d join product p ON(d.product_id = p.product_id)

SELECT DELIVERY_NUM, DELIVERY_DATE, DELIVERY_CHECK, d.PRODUCT_ID, MEMBER_ID, p.product_name, p.PRODUCT_PRICE FROM delivery d join product p ON(d.product_id = p.product_id) WHERE DELIVERY_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
